Sets a setup expression to be run before each test is evaluated.

Get Setup
Teardown

Sets a teardown expression to be run after each test is evaluated.

Arguments
teardown expr

expression to run after tests

Returns

Reference to this object

Get Teardown
Skip If

Determines if all tests under this test case should be skipped. The skip expr should eval to a 0 or 1. It is evaled before each test is started. When the skip expr returns 1, the skip description will be used when reporting the skip for each test.  If the skip description is not provided, the character representation of the expr will be used instead.

If you need this to skip only some of the tests under a test case, I would recommend making a separate test case for these rather than try to make the skip expr more dynamic.

Arguments
skip expr

determine if all cases should be skipped (eval delayed until ut test)

skip description

human-readable description of the reason for skip (used if skipped)

Returns

Reference to this object

Get Skip If
Get Skip Description
